hypothesis_content.title: Stress Regime Altcoin Divergence as Contrarian Signal
hypothesis_content.statement: During STRESS regimes, when BTC drops >8% in a single day but any two of {SOL, AVAX, GRT, PEPE} show positive price action or decline <3%, those diverging altcoins will outperform BTC by >15% over the subsequent 7 trading days as panic selling subsides.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Altcoins showing relative strength during extreme BTC selloffs indicate resilient underlying demand. These often lead the recovery as they were oversold less and have stronger holder bases. Meme coins (PEPE) and utility tokens (GRT) show different resilience drivers.
entry_conditions: Identify altcoins from {SOL, AVAX, GRT, PEPE} with daily return > -3% (minimum 2 coins)
Go long diverging altcoins, hedge with BTC short (50% hedge ratio)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Net portfolio return of 12% OR 7 days elapsed
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Any diverging altcoin drops >15% from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Diverging altcoins fail to outperform BTC during the recovery period or continue declining with high correlation.
